item.title: R Resources
item.author: jonthelaion@icloud.com (jonthelaion)
item.description: Blogs Cathy O’Neil Blog Data Science Central R Markdown Creating Websites with R Markdown (Currently Reading) General Data Science Doing Data Science Columbia - Applied Data Science Learning R The Art of R Programming - Norman Matloff (No Starch Press) R for Everyone: Advanced Analytics and Graphics - Jared Lander (Addison-Wesley) R in a Nutshell - Joseph Adler (O’Reilly) Learning Python Learning Python - Mark Lutz and David Ascher (O’Reilly) Python for Data Analysis - Wes McKinney (O’Reilly) Math Linear Algebra and Its Applications - Gilbert Strang (Cengage Learning) Convex Optimization - Stephen Boyd and Lieven Vandenberghe (Cambridge University Press) A First Course in Probability - Sheldon Ross (Academic Press) Data Analysis and Statistical Inference Statistical Inference - George Casella and Roger L.
